data.comment: The match is underway. Sheffield Wed have kicked-off.
Moses Odubajo (Sheffield Wed) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Jarred Gillett blows to start the second-half. Norwich with the kick-off.
Tony Pulis is making the team's first substitution at Carrow Road with Joey Pelupessy replacing Dominic Iorfa.
In the minute 60, Goal! Sheffield Wed have got their heads in front thanks to a Josh Windass strike.
The away team replace Josh Windass with Liam Palmer.
At Carrow Road, Julian Borner has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 79, Oliver Skipp (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Norwich make their first substitution with Josh Martin replacing Marco Stiepermann.
Josh Martin levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 84, Goal! Max Aarons gives Norwich a 2-1 lead.
Isaiah Brown is replacing Kadeem Harris for the away team.
Elias Kachunga is replacing Moses Odubajo for Sheffield Wed at Carrow Road.
In the minute 89, Daniel Farke (Norwich) is making a second substitution, with Alexander Tettey replacing Przemyslaw Placheta.
Jarred Gillett blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Tyrese Omotoye is on a sub for Mario Vrancic for Norwich.
